I wish to play this with a friend, as I have only been going through the solo story! I'm sure it would be more fun with lots of shenanigans playing with a good buddy. Even so, it is still a great experience, the challenging puzzles will always leave you thinking hard. The game is very creative and dynamic, it's awesome to see what Valve has achieved with the Portal series.

Hands down best puzzle game ever made.  Granted, Im not a huge puzzle dude but this game had fun enough machanics.  However, the reason i love the game so much is the story and its presentation.  It isn't the best story ever made, but it blew me away for this sort of game.  9.5/10
